content.text: Hi! I'm a big fan of comic books. Did you go to any comic cons?
I'm from France and I actually went to a comic con in Russia! It was really cool to meet the creators of my favorite comic book series in person.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to go to a comic con. What was it like?
It was amazing! There were so many people dressed up as their favorite characters, and there were tons of vendors selling comic books, toys, and other merchandise.
That sounds like so much fun! I wish I could have gone to that one.
Maybe you'll get to go to one next year!
I hope so!
What's your favorite comic book series?
I really like The Walking Dead. I've been reading it since the first issue came out.
I've heard good things about that series. I've never read it before, but I might have to check it out.
You should! It's really good.
Okay, I will!
What are some of your other hobbies?
I like to play video games, and I also like to spend time with my cats and dog.
I love video games too! What are some of your favorites?
I like to play a lot of different games, but some of my favorites are The Legend of Zelda, Mario, and Pokemon.
Those are all great games! I love The Legend of Zelda and Mario.
Me too! They're so much fun.
What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever and a poodle.
Oh, those are both cute breeds! I've always wanted a golden retriever.
They're great dogs! They're so friendly and playful.
They sound like a lot of fun.
They are! I love them both very much.
I'm glad you have such a great family.
Thank you! I am too
